chapter.text: 54|1|sameep aa gayee[1] pralay tatha do khand ho gaya chaand.
54|2|aur yadi ve dekhate hain koee nishaanee, to munh pher lete hain aur kahate hain: ye to jaadoo hai, jo hota raha hai.
54|3|aur unhonne jhuthalaaya aur anusaran kiya apanee aakaankshaon ka aur pratyek kaary ka ek nishchit samay hai.
54|4|aur nishchay aa chuke hain unake paas kuchh aise samaachaar, jinamen chetaavanee hai.
54|5|ye (quraan) poornatah tatvadarshita (gyaan) hai, phir bhee nahin kaam aayee unake, chetaavaniyaan.
54|6|to aap vimukh ho jaayen unase, jis din pukaarane vaala pukaarega ek apriy cheez kee[1] or.
54|7|jhukee hongee unakee aankhen. ve nikal rahe honge samaadhiyon se, jaise ki ve tiddee dal hon bikhare hue.
54|8|to usane praarthana kee apane paalanahaar se ki main vivash hoon, atah, mera badala le le.
54|9|jhuthalaaya inase pahale nooh kee jaati ne. to jhuthalaaya unhonne hamaare bhakt ko aur kaha ki paagal hai aur (use) jhadaka gaya.
54|10|to usane praarthana kee apane paalanahaar se ki main vivash hoon, atah mera badala le le.
54|11|to hamane khol diye aakaash ke dvaar dhaara pravaah jal ke saath.
54|12|tatha phaad diye dharatee ke srot, to mil gaya (aakaash aur dharatee ka) jal us kaary ke anusaar jo nishchit kiya gaya.
54|13|aur savaar kar diya hamane use (nooh ko) takhton tatha keelon vaalee (naav) par.
54|14|jo chal rahee thee hamaaree raksha mein, usaka badala lene ke lie, jisake saath kufr kiya gaya tha.
54|15|aur hamane chhod diya ise ek shiksha banaakar. to kya, hai koee shiksha grahan karane vaala
54|16|phir (dekh lo!) kaisee rahee meree yaatana tatha meree chetaavaniyaan
54|17|aur hamane saral kar diya hai quraan ko shiksha ke lie. to kya, hai koee shiksha grahan karane vaala
54|18|jhuthalaaya aad ne, to kaisee rahee meree yaatana tatha meree chetaavaniyaan
54|19|hamane bhej dee unapar kadee aandhee, ek nirantar ashubh din mein.
54|20|jo ukhaad rahee thee logon ko, jaise ve khajoor ke khokhale tane hon.
54|21|to kaisee rahee meree yaatana tatha meree chetaavaniyaan
54|22|aur hamane saral kar diya hai quraan ko shiksha ke lie. to kya, hai koee shiksha grahan karane vaala
54|23|jhuthala diya samood[1] ne chetaavaniyon ko.
54|24|aur kahaah kya apane hee mein se ek manushy ka ham anusaran karen? vaastav mein, tab to ham nishchay bade kupath tatha paagalapan mein hain.
54|25|kya utaaree gayee hai shiksha useepar hamaare beech mein se? (nahin) balki vah bada jhootha ahankaaree hai.
54|26|unhen kal hee gyaan ho jaayega ki kaun bada jhootha ahankaaree hai
54|27|vaastav mein, ham bhejane vaale hain oontanee unakee pareeksha ke lie. atah, (he saaleh!) tum unake (parinaam kee) prateeksha karo tatha dhairy rakho.
54|28|aur unhen soochit kar do ki jal vibhaajit hoga unake beech aur pratyek apanee baaree ke din[1] upasthit hoga.
54|29|to unhonne pukaara apane saathee ko. to usane aakraman kiya aur use vadh kar diya.
54|30|phir kaisee rahee meree yaatana aur meree chetaavaniyaan
54|31|hamane bhej dee unapar karkash dhvani, to ve ho gaye baada banaane vaale kee raundee huee baadh ke samaan (choor-choor).
54|32|aur hamane saral kar diya hai quraan ko shiksha ke lie. to kya, hai koee shiksha grahan karane vaala
54|33|jhuthala diya loot kee jaati ne chetaavaniyon ko.
54|34|to hamane bhej diye unapar patthar loot ke parijanon ke siva, hamane unhen bacha liya raatri ke pichhale pahar.
54|35|apane vishesh anugrah se. isee prakaar ham badala dete hain usako jo krtagy ho.
54|36|aur nihsandeh, loot ne saavadhaan kiya unako hamaaree pakad se. parantu, unhonne sandeh kiya chetaavaniyon ke vishay mein.
54|37|aur bahalaana chaaha us (loot) ko usake atithiyon[1] se to hamane andhee kar dee unakee aankhen ki chakho meree yaatana tatha meree chetaavaniyon (ka parinaam).
54|38|aur unapar aa pahunchee praatah bhor hee mein sthaayee yaatana.
54|39|to chakho meree yaatana tatha meree chetaavaniyaan.
54|40|aur hamane saral kar diya hai quraan ko shiksha ke lie. to kya, hai koee shiksha grahan karane vaala
54|41|tatha firauniyon ke paas bhee chetaavaniyaan aayeen.
54|42|unhonne jhuthalaaya hamaaree pratyek nishaanee ko to hamane pakad liya unhen ati prabhaavee aadhipati ke pakadane ke samaan.
54|43|(he makka vaasiyon!) kya tumhaare kaafir uttam hain unase athava tumhaaree mukti likhee huee hai aakaasheey pustakon mein
54|44|athava ve kahate hain ki ham vijeta samooh hain.
54|45|sheedhr hee praajit kar diya jaayega ye samooh aur ve peeth dikha[1] denge.
54|46|balki pralay unake vachan ka samay hai tatha pralay adhik kadee aur teekhee hai.
54|47|vastutah, ye paapee, kupath tatha agni mein hain.
54|48|jis din ve ghaseete jaayenge yaatana mein apane mukhon ke bal (unase kaha jaayega ki) chakho narak kee yaatana ka svaad.
54|49|nishchay hamane pratyek vastu ko utpann kiya hai ek anumaan se.
54|50|aur hamaara aadesh bas ek hee baar hota hai aankh jhapakane ke samaan.
54|51|aur ham dhvast kar chuke hain tumhaare jaise bahut-se samudaayon ko.
54|52|jo kuchh unhonne kiya hai karmapatr mein hai.
54|53|aur pratyek tuchchh tatha badee baat ankit hai.
54|54|vastutah, sadaachaaree log svargon tatha naharon mein honge.
54|55|saty ke sthaan mein, ati saamarthyavaan svaamee ke paas.
